frameset.edef: To leave out, pass over or exclude

example.parse: (S (NP-SBJ (NP (NP (NOUN_PROP روما)) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON التي)) (S (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لم)) (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:J يتغافل) (PP-CLR (PREP عن) (NP (NP (PRON_3FS ها)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-1)))) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM النص) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_NOM المقدس)))))) (PUNC ,) (NP (PRON_3FS هي))) (NP-PRD (NP (DET+NOUN المستوى) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_NOM التاريخي)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN لقوة)))) (PUNC .))
